name: Beat Roll
description:
Beat Ball rolling through the amazing the road or race, just listen carefully to the melody music. Just drag on the screen and zigzag the ball. Trust your hearing ears and skillful finger rather your eyes to dancing beats line and Zig Zag the Ball to avoid a trap, bombs, obstacles, and falling over the edge.

GAMEPLAY
Just follow the rhythm of the music which combines various instruments such as guitar, drum and piano, this game is one of the popular ball Maze for King piano games which has high-quality piano songs and gameplay.
Show your accuracy skill
Friendly control and simple gameplay
Enhance with the top-hit soundtrack, music content
Feature update weekly
Enhance with new design
